token.Une plateforme e-commerce, qui offre aux: CleverPlace is a commercial platform based on the blockchain, offering cashback against tokens on every purchase
token.CleverPlace est basée sur la Blockchain: CleverPlace is based on the blockchain: important operations will be registered in a smart contract, allowing us to establish strict and auditable rules, applied automatically.
token.Les achats effectués sur Cleverplace per: Purchases on CleverPlace allow customers to exchange tokens for cashback. Tokens thus recovered by CleverPlace are then redistributed to the community.
token.Notre marché Pilote : l'immobilier neuf: OUR PILOT MARKET : NEWLY BUILT REAL ESTATE
token.Malgré un chiffre d'affaires mondial de: Despite a worldwide turnover of 10 trillion dollars for 2017 and more than 60 billions euros for the sole French market in 2016, the market of newly built real estate does not yet benefit from a major marketplace.
token.Réunion sur une marketplace unique de la: Extensive information gathered in a single comprehensive platform
token.Libre accès à une documentation exhausti: Free access to an exhaustive documentation
token.Affichage détaillé des points d’intérêt: Listing of all Points Of Interest around each product
token.Notre objectif : une version open-source: OUR FINAL GOAL: AN OPEN-SOURCE VERSION OF CLEVERPLACE
token.Notre plateforme peut être déployée sur: Our e-commmerce platform can be deployed on any given market
token.Nous allons promouvoir la version open-s: We will promote the open-source version of our marketplace in order to reach the full potential of CleverPlace
token.Permettre à quiconque de déployer la pla: Allowing anyone to deploy the platform and gather their own community on any given market, relying on our core principles:
token.Les CleverTokens seront utilisés pour le: CleverTokens will be used for the cashback mechanism
token.Les CleverTokens récupérés sont renvoyés: CleverTokens recovered will be sent back to the community
token.Le montant du cashback sera stocké dans: The cashback amount will be stored in the blockchain
token.Pas de frais d'utilisations, mais la dét: No user fees, but holding CleverTokens
token.Bénéfice client clair et immédiat: A clear and immediate customer benefit
token.Lancement avec 2 000 programmes en Franc: Launching with 2.000+ property developments = one third of the global offering in France from Day 1
token.Prix facilement comparable avec celui af: Easily comparable prices on competing sites
token.Offre intégrale et unique sur le marché: Global yet unique offer on the market
token.Bénéfice inchangé: Net price (excluding margins) not impacted by the cashback
token.Avantage concurrentiel grâce au cashback: Advantage on the competition thanks to our cashback
token.Pas de problème lié à la protection du m: No problem related to market protection
token.Plus grande proxmité avec ses clients gr: Greater proximity to customers through the community
token.Société de droit français: CleverPlace is a company registered in France, compliant with the rules edicted by the AMF
token.Distribution à toute la communauté des j: Tokens are redistributed to the entire community each time a client collects his cashback
token.Modèle sans limite: notre plateforme peu: Limitless model: our platform can be deployed on any given market, offering a cashback against CleverTokens

token.2% de parts du marché Français conquis: 2% of the French market is conquered

token.70% de la marge commerciale est récupéra: On each purchase, 70% of the sales margin can be exchanged for tokens.
token.L'acheteur visualise le prix, la marge d: Buyers can visualize the price, the recoverable margin and the amount of tokens required to recover their cashback.
token.100% des jetons récupérés par CleverPlac: 100% of the tokens recovered by CleverPlace are redistributed to the community members
token.Les jetons récupérés par CleverPlace apr: After a cashback, the tokens recovered by CleverPlace are distributed to the sponsor (in case one was involved in the purchase) and then to the entire community.
token.Le modèle de redistribution favorise la: The redistribution model promotes participating to the community and holding tokens.
